thread.title: Frances Ortega
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Frances Ortega

author: Frances Ortega
title: Frances Ortega
text: I was looking for a janesport back pack. I couldn't find one at any shop. Walked into lifestyle sport. A girl asked me what i was looking for. They didn't have them either but suggested ordering one online. She took all my details. They were on sale to boot and came the very next day to my front door. Very satisfying that a 20 mile shopping trip wasn't wasted after all. I think i spend less than 10 min in the shop wich was great as I had other shopping to do. Really pleased!
